credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Design for King Henry VIII's Costume in Mary Queen of Scots
provenance: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on off-white laid paper
description: The king is seen standing frontally, legs apart, wearing a stylized black and yellow costume with red stockings and hat. Blue hair and beard. Signed, lower left (in ink): "E. McKinight Kauffer" and inscribed, upper right: "Henry VIII - Art League of Service / (Barius)." Below inscribed: a slight pencil sketch in costume.
name: Drawing
